trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of installers to be run during an installation.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller en samling av installationsprogram som ska köras under en installation.

trans-unit.source: The InstallerCollection provides the methods and properties that your application needs to manage a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> objects.
trans-unit.target: InstallerCollection tillhandahåller metoder och egenskaper som programmet behöver hantera en samling <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>objekt.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>

trans-unit.source: Use any of the following three ways to add installers to the collection: - The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Add%2A> method adds a single installer to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Använd någon av följande tre sätt att lägga till installationsprogram i samlingen: – <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Add%2A>metoden lägger till en enda installer till samlingen.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.AddRange%2A> methods add multiple installers to the collection.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.AddRange%2A>Metoder lägga till flera installationsprogram i samlingen.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Insert%2A> method and the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Item%2A> property, which is the InstallerCollection indexer, each add a single installer to the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Insert%2A>Metod och <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Item%2A>-egenskap som är InstallerCollection indexeraren varje lägga till en enda installer i samlingen med det angivna indexet.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Item%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Insert%2A>

trans-unit.source: Remove installers through the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Ta bort installationsprogram via den <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Remove%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: Check whether an installer is in the collection by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollera om ett installationsprogram i samlingen med hjälp av den <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: Find where an installer is located in the collection by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hitta var ett installationsprogram som finns i samlingen med hjälp av den <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.IndexOf%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: The installers in a collection are run when the installer containing the collection, as specified by the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, calls their <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, or <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Installerare i en samling körs när installationsprogrammet som innehåller mängden som anges av den <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen, anrop sina <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>, eller <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For examples of the usage of an installer collection, see the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller> and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller> classes.
trans-unit.target: Exempel på användning av en samling i installationsprogrammet finns i <xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller>och <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>klasser.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.AssemblyInstaller>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified installer to this collection of installers.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till angivna installationsprogrammet samlingen installationsprogram.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of the added <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to specify the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> containing this collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>egenskapen för den tillagda <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>anges för att ange den <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>som innehåller den här samlingen.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> that represents the installer to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"> </xref> som representerar installationsprogrammet ska läggas till i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the added installer.
trans-unit.target: Det nollbaserade indexet för det tillagda installationsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified array of installers to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till den angivna matrisen installationsprogram för den här samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of each added <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> containing this collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>egenskapen för varje läggs <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>anges till den <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>som innehåller den här samlingen.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> that represents the installers to add to this collection.
trans-unit.target: En matris av typen <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"> </xref> som representerar de installationsprogram för att lägga till den här samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified collection of installers to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Lägger till den angivna samlingen med installationsprogram för den här samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of each added <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> containing this collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>egenskapen för varje läggs <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>anges till den <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>som innehåller den här samlingen.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection"></xref> that represents the installers to add to this collection.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection"> </xref> som representerar de installationsprogram för att lägga till den här samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified installer is included in collection.
trans-unit.target: Anger om den angivna installatören ingår i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> that represents the installer to look for.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"> </xref> som representerar installationsprogrammet ska sökas.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified installer is in this collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den angivna installatören finns i samlingen; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the items from the collection to an array, begining at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Kopierar objekt från samlingen till en matris som börjar med det angivna indexet.

trans-unit.source: The array to copy to.
trans-unit.target: Kopiera till matrisen.

trans-unit.source: The index of the array at which to paste the collection.
trans-unit.target: Index för matrisen som du vill klistra in samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of a specified installer in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Anger index för en angiven installer i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"> </xref> att hitta i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the installer in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Det nollbaserade indexet för installationsprogrammet i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified installer into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Infogar angivna installationsprogrammet i samlingen med det angivna indexet.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert the installer.
trans-unit.target: Det nollbaserade indexet som du vill infoga installationsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"> </xref> att infoga.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an installer at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger ett installationsprogram med det angivna indexet.

trans-unit.source: When the specified <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is placed in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection>, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> that contains the collection.
trans-unit.target: När den angivna <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>placeras i den <xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>-egenskapen för den <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>anges till den <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>som innehåller samlingen.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.InstallerCollection> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the installer to get or set.
trans-unit.target: Det nollbaserade indexet för att hämta eller ange installationsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> that represents the installer at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"> </xref> som representerar installationsprogrammet med det angivna indexet.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes before a new installer is inserted into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utför ytterligare anpassade processer innan en ny installer infogas i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert `value`.
trans-unit.target: Det nollbaserade indexet som du vill infoga `value`.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the installer at `index`.
trans-unit.target: Det nya värdet för installationsprogrammet på `index`.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes before an installer is removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utför ytterligare anpassade processer innan ett installationsprogram tas bort från samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which `value` can be found.
trans-unit.target: Det nollbaserade indexet som `value` kan hittas.

trans-unit.source: The installer to be removed from `index`.
trans-unit.target: Installationsprogrammet ska tas bort från `index`.

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes before an existing installer is set to a new value.
trans-unit.target: Utför ytterligare anpassade processer innan ett installationsprogram för ett befintligt anges till ett nytt värde.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to replace `oldValue`.
trans-unit.target: Det nollbaserade indexet som du vill ersätta `oldValue`.

trans-unit.source: The value to replace with `newValue.`
trans-unit.target: Det värde som ska ersätta med`newValue.`

trans-unit.source: The new value of the installer at `index`.
trans-unit.target: Det nya värdet för installationsprogrammet på `index`.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Tar bort den angivna <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"> </xref> från samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A> property of the removed <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>egenskapen för den borttagna <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer>anges till `null`.</xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer> </xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Parent%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"></xref> that represents the installer to remove.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Configuration.Install.Installer"> </xref> som representerar installationsprogrammet ska tas bort.
